com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.treetable

Interface ITreeTableModelListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener, TreeModelListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRowHeader, LayerContainer, LayerContainerRowHeader, MacLayerContainerRowHeader, MacTreeTableRowHeader, TreeTable, TreeTableRowHeader

    public interface ITreeTableModelListener
extends TreeModelListener
    A listener for tree table specific events. The listener extends the standard TreeModelListener interface with callback methods that will inform the application if the user edited a node's key value or some of its column values.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.6 $
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void treeNodeKeyChanged(TreeTableModelEvent evt)
      Callback method that gets invoked if the user edited the key value of a tree table node.
      void treeNodeValueChanged(TreeTableModelEvent evt)
      Callback method that gets invoked if the user edited a column value of a tree table node.

      • Methods inherited from interface javax.swing.event.TreeModelListener

        treeNodesChanged, treeNodesInserted, treeNodesRemoved, treeStructureChanged
